it.cnr.isti.hpc.dexter.label

Class IdHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.cnr.isti.hpc.dexter.label.IdHelper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IdToLabel, LabelToId

    public class IdHelper
extends java.lang.Object
implements IdToLabel, LabelToId
    An IdHelper provides the conversion between an entity label (e.g., Pablo_Picasso) and an integer representing the entity (e.g., 24176).
    Author:
    Diego Ceccarelli, diego.ceccarelli@isti.cnr.it created on 05/lug/2012
